PrecisEnactment of REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PAYMENTS IN LIEU OF TAXES ACT AND SCHEDULES I TO III TO THAT ACT - which update the Municipal Grants Regulations, 1980, the Crown Corporation Grants Regulations and Schedules I, II and III to this Act, in order to make them consistent with recent amendments to the Municipal Grants Act [Bill C-10].
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0494 Publication Date: 2001-11-21
Attachments
precis:
Enactment of REGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE
PAYMENTS IN LIEU OF TAXES ACT AND SCHEDULES I TO III TO THAT ACT - which
update the Municipal Grants Regulations, 1980, the Crown Corporation Grants
Regulations and Schedules I, II and III to this Act, in order to make them
consistent with recent amendments to the Municipal Grants Act [Bill C-10].
